alert.note: Alert for Meade; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:16PM MDT until June 29 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ziebach County in west central South Dakota... Northeastern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Eastern Perkins County in northwestern South Dakota... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 615 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Bison to 8 miles southeast of Date to 7 miles southeast of Mud Butte, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Bison around 620 PM MDT. Chance around 635 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Meadow, Glad Valley, Durkee Lake, Faith, Red Elm and Dupree. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
